name: Trauma Elevator
description:
One day Nico went to a therapist to heal his lifelong traumas. During treatment Nico was hypnotized and had to fight his deepest fears. The deeper Nico goes into his memories, the more difficult his journey will be. Your goal is to reach the last level of his brain and help Nico free himself from his traumas.

WARNING:  You may want to turn down the volume to play this game!

PLEASE READ! 

THANK YOU <3

How to play:

Shoot the monsters  when they are vulnerable:
